Want to make the holidays even more special? Serve individual pumpkin pies! Use Libby’s Pure Pumpkin and Carnation Evaporated Milk in your…

Want to make the holidays even more special? Serve individual pumpkin pies! Use Libby's Pure Pumpkin and Carnation Evaporated Milk in your favorite recipe, then simply pour into a muffin pan lined with pre-made crust, and bake. It's so easy and your guests will love them.
